name: Solitaire Classic ◆ Card Game
description:
Welcome to the amazing world of solitaire! FreeCell is one of the most played patience games in the world. You can enjoy it anytime and anywhere, on your mobile phone or tablet.
Each day you will receive a unique Daily Challenge. Solve the Daily Challenge and receive a crown for that day.
Download now to play the best classic Solitaire card game now!(ง •_•)ง

Solitaire Features：
* Beautiful Graphics
* Klondike Gameplay
* Unlimited Free Undos & Hints
* Daily Challenges
* Standard & Vegas Scoring
* 1 Card Draw / 3 Cards Draw
* Timed Mode
* Personal Records
* Custom Game Styles
* Left Handed Mode
